noun 1 condition; term; factor 貿易條件 màoyì tiáojiàn terms of trade 自然條件 zìrán
                    tiáojiàn natural conditions 利用有利的條件 lìyòng yǒulì de tiáojiàn make use of the
                    favourable factors 在目前條件下 zài mùqián tiáojiàn xià given the present conditions;
                    under present circumstances 在對等的條件下給予優惠待遇 zài duì děng de tiáojiàn xià jǐyǔ
                    yōuhuì dàiyù give preferential treatment on a reciprocal basis 這個工廠生產條件很好。 zhège
                    gōngchǎng shēngchǎn tiáojiàn hěn hǎo. This factory has all the right conditions
                    for production. 2 requirement; prerequisite; qualification 提出條件 Tíchū tiáojiàn
                    list the prerequisites; put forward the requirements 當宇航員對身體條件要求很嚴。 Dāng
                    yǔhángyuán duì shēntǐ tiáojiàn yāoqiú hěn yán. The physical fitness requirements
                    for being an astronaut are very stiff. 做這項工作需要具備什麼條件？ Zuò zhè xiàng gōngzuò
                    xūyào jùbèi shénme tiáojiàn？ What qualifications are needed for this job?

verb bear fruit; fructify 這棵樹去年結了好多果兒。 Zhè kē shù qùnián jiē le hǎoduō guǒr.
                    This tree bore a lot of fruit last year.

verb take no care of; not look after 他整天忙, 從來不管孩子。 Tā zhěngtiān máng, cónglái
                    bùguǎn háizi. He is always busy and never has time to care for his child.
                    他對公司裡的事不管不顧。 Tā duì gōngsī lǐ de shì bùguǎn bù gù. He has no interest in what’s
                    going on in the company.
                    conjunction regardless of; no matter (what, who, etc.) 不管多大的困難, 我們都能克服。 bùguǎn
                    duō dà de kùnnan, wǒmen dōu néng kèfú. We can overcome any difficulty, however
                    great. 不管他來不來, 我們(都)得走了。 bùguǎn tā lái bù lái, wǒmen děi zǒu le. Regardless of
                    whether he comes or not, we’ve got to leave. 不管怎樣我不想去。 Bùguǎnzěnyàng wǒ bù xiǎng
                    qù. In any case I don’t want to go.

verb 1 forget 我永遠不會忘記我們初次見面的那一天。 wǒ yǒngyuǎn bù huì wàngjì wǒmen chūcì
                    jiànmiàn de nà yī tiān. I’ll never forget the day we first met. 2 overlook;
                    neglect 不能忘記自己的責任。 Bùnéng wàngjì zìjǐ de zérèn. One mustn’t neglect one’s
                    duties.

noun 1 connections; relations; relationship 搞好關係 gǎohǎo guānxi build good
                    personal relations 家庭關係 jiātíng guānxi family connections; family (or familial)
                    relations 托人找關係 tuōrén zhǎo guānxi seek for special connections 他們的關係不好。 Tāmen
                    de guānxi bù hǎo. They are not on good terms. 她和老闆的關係很好。 tā hé lǎobǎn deguānxi
                    hěn hǎo. She’s well in with her boss. 2 [often used correlatively with 沒有, 有]
                    relevance; bearing; influence; significance 你去不去, 關係不大。 Nǐ qù bù qù, guānxi
                    bùdà. Your going or not won’t make much difference. 這件事跟我沒有關係。 Zhè jiàn shì gēn
                    wǒ méiyǒu guānxi. This matter has nothing to do with me. 這一點對今後工作關係重大。 Zhè
                    yīdiǎn duì jīnhòu gōngzuò guānxi zhòngdà. This has an important bearing on our
                    future work. 3 [usu. with 由於 or 因為 to indicate cause or reason] 由於時間關係, 就談到這裡吧。
                    Yóuyú shíjiān guānxi, jiù tán dào zhèlǐ ba. Time is limited, so I’ll stop here.
                    4 credentials showing membership in or affiliation with an organization 組織關係
                    zǔzhī guānxi membership credentials (or papers) 5 euphemistic (extramarital)
                    sexual relations 發生關係 fāshēng guānxi have sexual relations with sb. (not as
                    husband and wife); have an affair
                    verb concern; affect; have a bearing on; have to do with 環保關係到國家的可持續發展。 Huán-bǎo
                    guānxi dào guójiā de kěchíxù fāzhǎn. Environmental protection directly affects
                    sustainable development in our country.

adjective special; particular; out of the ordinary 特別的愛好 tèbié de àihào an
                    unusual hobby 他的口音很特別。 Tā de kǒuyin hěn tèbié. He has a peculiar accent.
                    這棟樓的設計沒有什麼特別的地方。 Zhè dòng lóu de shèjì méiyǒu shénmetèbié de dìfang. The design
                    of this building is nothing out of the ordinary. 這種花每當夜晚就散發出一種特別的香味兒。 Zhèzhǒng
                    huā měidāng yèwǎn jiù sànfā chū yī zhǒng tèbié de xiāngwèir. As evening
                    approaches, this flower gives off a distinctive fragrance.
                    adverb 1 especially; particularly 質量特別好 zhìliàng tèbié hǎo of extra fine quality
                    工作特別努力 Gōngzuò tèbié nǔlì especially hard-working 建設一支特別能戰鬥的隊伍 jiànshè yī zhī
                    tèbié néng zhàndòu de duìwu train a contingent of exceptional fighters 今天特別熱。
                    Jīntiān tèbié rè. It’s extremely hot today. 這個報告特別有教育意義。 zhège bàogào tèbié yǒu
                    jiàoyù yìyì. The talk was particularly instructive. 2 for a special purpose;
                    specially; deliberately 他臨走時特別去向女主人道謝。 Tā línzǒu shí tèbié qùxiàng nǚzhǔrén
                    dàoxiè. He made a point of thanking his hostess before he left the party.
                    這些花是我特別為你摘的。 Zhèxiē huā shì wǒ tèbié wèi nǐ zhāi de. I picked these flowers
                    specially for you. 3 all the more; in particular 他喜愛體育, 特別是籃球。 Tā xǐ'ài
                    tǐyù, tèbié shì lánqiú. He loves sports, particularly basketball. 這裡最需要醫務人員,
                    特別是外科醫生。 Zhèlǐ zuì xūyào yīwù rényuán, tèbié shì wàikē yīshēng. There’s a huge
                    need for medical workers here, especially surgeons.

noun beginning; outset; commencement 一開始 yī kāishǐ at the very beginning
                    一種新的工作, 開始總會遇到一些困難。 Yī zhǒng xīn de gōngzuò, kāishǐ zǒng huì yùdào yīxiē kùnnan.
                    You always run into some difficulties at the beginning of a new job.
                    verb begin; start; commence 開始生效 kāishǐ shēngxiào take effect; come into effect
                    (or force) 從頭開始 cóngtóu kāishǐ start from the very beginning 開始討論實質性問題 Kāishǐ
                    tǎolùn shízhìxìng wèntí come to substantive questions 今天從第五課開始。 Jīntiān cóng
                    dì-wǔ kè kāishǐ. Today we’ll begin with Lesson 5. 他們開始了旅行中最危險的階段。 Tāmenkāishǐ le
                    lǚxíng zhōng zuì wēixiǎn de jiēduàn. They entered upon the most dangerous part
                    of the journey.

adjective 1 simple; uncomplicated (opp. 複雜) 簡單明了 jiǎndānmíngliǎo simple and
                    clear; concise and explicit 簡單拼湊 jiǎndān pīncòu simply piercing together 吃得很簡單
                    Chī de hěn jiǎndān have simple food 生活得很簡單 shēnghuó de hěn jiǎndān lead a simple
                    life 事情沒那麼簡單。 Shìqing méi nàme jiǎndān. There is more to it. 這機器構造簡單。 Zhè jīqì
                    gòuzào jiǎndān. The machine is simple in structure. 2 [usu. in the negative]
                    commonplace; ordinary 她的槍法那麼準, 真不簡單。 Tā de qiāngfǎ nàme zhǔn, zhēn bù jiǎndān.
                    She’s a marvel to be able to shoot with such accuracy. 這家伙鬼點子特多, 可不簡單。 Zhè
                    jiāhuo guǐdiǎnzi tè duō, kě bù jiǎndān. This fellow is no simpleton. He is full
                    of tricks. 3 oversimplified; casual 簡單粗暴 jiǎndāncūbào do things in an
                    oversimplified and crude way 不能用簡單的方法去解決這個問題。 Bù néng yòng jiǎndān de fāngfǎ qù
                    jiějué zhège wèntí. This matter cannot be settled in a summary fashion.
                    這篇文章我只是簡單地看了看。 Zhè piān wénzhāng wǒ zhǐshì jiǎndān de kàn le kàn. I only skimmed
                    through this article.

verb handle; conduct; transact 辦理進出口業務 bànlǐ jìnchūkǒu yèwù handle imports and
                    exports 辦理入境手續 bànlǐ rùjìng shǒuxù go through entry formalities (or procedures)
                    這些事情你可以斟酌辦理。 Zhèxiē shìqing nǐ kěyǐ zhēnzhuó bànlǐ. You may handle these matters
                    as you see fit.

noun experience 個人經歷 Gèrén jīnglì personal experiences 生活經歷 shēnghuó jīnglì
                    life experience 他這人經歷多, 見識廣。 Tā zhè rén jīnglì duō, jiànshi guǎng. He’s a man of
                    wide knowledge and experience.
                    verb go through; undergo; experience 現代科學技術正經歷著一場革命。 xiàndài kēxué jìshù zhèng
                    jīnglì zhe yī cháng gémìng. Modern science and technology are in the throes of a
                    revolution.

adjective 1 difficult 呼吸困難 hūxī kùnnan breathe with difficulty 2 financially
                    difficult; economically straitened 生活困難 shēnghuó kùnnan live in straitened
                    circumstances
                    noun difficulty; hardness 困難重重 kùnnanchóngchóng be beset with difficulties 困難行業
                    kùnnan hángyè difficulty-ridden industry 困難職工 kùnnan zhígōng the needy (worker)
                    困難像彈簧, 你弱他就強。 kùnnan xiàng tánhuáng, nǐ ruò tājiù qiáng. Problems loom large
                    when men don’t.

noun knowledge; intellect 知識淵博 zhīshi yuānbó wide knowledge; erudite; learned
                    知識密集型產業 zhīshi mìjí xíng chǎnyè knowledge-intensive industries 技術知識 jìshù zhīshi
                    technical know-how 書本知識 shūběn zhīshi book learning 跟這種沒有知識的人議論嚴肅音樂本來就沒有意思。 Gēn
                    zhèzhǒng méiyǒu zhīshi de rén yìlùn yánsù yīnyuè běnlái jiù méiyǒu yìsi. There’s
                    no point discussing serious music with such ignorant people.

noun 1 general (or elementary) knowledge 科學常識 kēxué chángshí general knowledge
                    of science 衛生常識 wèishēng chángshí elementary knowledge of hygiene and sanitation
                    2 common sense 天冷了要穿得暖一點兒, 這是常識。 tiān lěng le yào chuān de nuǎn yīdiǎnr, zhè shì
                    chángshí. It’s common sense to dress more warmly in cold weather.

noun fact 與事實不符 Yǔ shìshí bùfú not tally with the facts 事實如此。 Shìshírúcǐ. This
                    is how things are (or stand). 事實恰恰相反。 Shìshí qiàqià xiāngfǎn. The facts are just
                    the opposite. or The opposite is the case. 事實俱在, 不容抵賴。 Shìshí jù zài, bù róng
                    dǐlài. The facts are there and cannot be denied.
noun perfume; scent 噴香水 pēn xiāngshuǐ spray on perfume

verb 1 (dī) carry; hold (sth. with a handle) 手裡提著個籃子 Shǒulǐ tí zhe ge lánzi
                    carry a basket in one hand 我去提壺水來。 Wǒ qù tí hú shuǐ lái. I will fetch a kettle
                    of water. 2 lift; raise; promote 從井裡提水 Cóng jǐng lǐ tí shuǐ draw water from a
                    well 把某人提到領導崗位上去 Bǎ mǒurén tídào lǐngdǎo gǎngwèi shàng qù promote sb. to a
                    position of leadership 把問題提到原則高度來分析 bǎ wèntí tídào yuánzé gāodù lái fēnxi
                    analyse a problem from the level of principle 把鞋提上。 Bǎ xié tí shàng. Pull your
                    shoes on. 這種自行車很輕便, 一隻手就能提起來。 zhèzhǒng zìxíngchē hěn qīngbiàn, yī zhīshǒu jiù
                    néng tí qǐlai. This bicycle is very light. You can lift it with one hand. 3
                    shift to an earlier time; move up a date 把會議的日期往前提 bǎ huìyì de rìqī wǎng qiántí
                    move the date of the meeting up 4 put forward; bring up; raise 提方案 tí
                    fāng'àn suggest (or propose) plans 提抗議 tí kàngyì lodge a protest 提條件 tí
                    tiáojiàn put forward conditions 提問題 tí wèntí ask a question 提要求 tí yāoqiú make
                    demands 提意見 tí yìjian make a criticism; make comments (or suggestions)
                    把事情提到會上去討論 bǎ shìqing tídào huì shàng qù tǎolùn take (or submit) the matter to
                    the meeting for discussion 把計劃生育提到議事日程上來 bǎ jìhuà shēngyù tídào yìshì rìchéng
                    shàng lái put family planning on the agenda 5 draw (or take) out; extract
                    我到車站提行李去。 Wǒ dào chēzhàn tí xíngli qù. I’m going to collect my luggage at the
                    station. 銀行裡的這筆款子你提了沒有？ Yínháng lǐ de zhè bǐ kuǎnzi nǐ tí le méiyǒu？ Have you
                    drawn the money from the bank? 6 summon (a prisoner) for interrogation 提犯人 Tí
                    fànrén fetch a prisoner for interrogation 7 mention; refer to; bring up 別再提那件事了。
                    Bié zài tí nà jiàn shì le. Don’t bring that up again. 論文有幾處提到了該書。 Lùnwén yǒu jǐ
                    chù tí dàoliǎo gāi shū. The paper contains several references to that book.
                    他提了一下這個計劃, 但沒有說明細節。 Tā tí le yīxià zhège jìhuà, dàn méiyǒu shuōmíng xìjié. He
                    mentioned the plan, but gave no details.
                    noun 1 dipper 油提 yóutí oil-dipper 2 rising stroke (in Chinese characters)

noun 1 drop (of liquid) 雨點兒 yǔdiǎnr raindrop 2 spot; dot; speck 墨點兒 mòdiǎnr
                    ink spots 3 dot stroke (in Chinese characters) 4 mathematics point 兩點成一直線。 Liǎng
                    diǎn chéng yī zhíxiàn. A straight line is formed by connecting two points. 5
                    decimal point; point 三點兒五 Sāndiǎnr wǔ three point five (3.5) 6 place; point 突破一點
                    tūpò yīdiǎn make a breakthrough at one point 7 aspect; feature 從這點上看 cóng zhè
                    diǎn shàng kàn viewed from this aspect 對這一點沒人懷疑。 Duì zhè yīdiǎn méi rén huáiyí.
                    Nobody has any doubt about that. 8 finance point 上證指數收漲44點。 Shàngzhèng Zhǐshù
                    shōu zhǎng 44 diǎn. The Shanghai Composite Index ended up 44 points.
                    verb 1 place a dot 點三個點兒表示省略 diǎn sān ge diǎnr biǎoshì shěnglüè a sequence of
                    three dots marks an omission 2 touch on very briefly; skim 他用篙一點就把船撐開了。 Tā yòng
                    gāo yīdiǎn jiù bǎ chuán chēng kāi le. He pushed the boat off with a shove of the
                    pole. 她發言時點(到)了這件事。 tā fāyán shí diǎn le zhè jiàn shì. She touched on the matter
                    in her speech. 3 drip 點眼藥 diǎn yǎnyào put drops in the eyes 4 sow in holes;
                    dibble 點豆子 diǎn dòuzi dibble beans 5 check one by one; count 點貨 diǎnhuò check
                    over goods; take stock 請把錢點一點。 Qǐng bǎ qián diǎn yī diǎn. Please count the
                    money. 6 select; choose 他點了牛排。 Tā diǎn le niúpái. He ordered a steak. 7 hint;
                    point out 一點他就明白了。 Yīdiǎn tā jiù míngbai le. He quickly took the hint. 8 light;
                    burn; kindle 點燈 diǎn dēng light a lamp 他是火爆性子, 一點就著。 Tā shì huǒbào xìngzi,
                    yīdiǎn jiùzhe. He’s got a fiery temper and flares up very quickly. 9 embellish;
                    decorate 裝點 zhuāngdiǎn furnish; decorate
                    measure word 1 a little; a bit; some 讀點兒魯迅 Dú diǎn r Lǔ Xùn read some of Lu
                    Xun’s works 給我點兒紙。 gěi wǒ diǎn r zhǐ. Give me some paper, will you? 他今天好點兒了。 Tā
                    jīntiān hǎo diǎn r le. He’s feeling a bit better today. 人的認識一點兒也不能離開實踐。 Rén de
                    rènshi yī diǎn r yě bùnéng líkāi shíjiàn. Human knowledge cannot be separated
                    from practice. 2 [for items] 我有幾點不成熟的想法。 Wǒ yǒu jǐ diǎn bù chéngshú de xiǎngfa.
                    I have some tentative suggestions.
                    noun 1 o'clock 上午九點(鐘) Shàngwǔ jiǔ diǎn zhōng nine o’clock in the morning
                    現在幾點了？ Xiànzài jǐ diǎn le？ What time is it now? 2 appointed time 到點了 Dào diǎn le
                    it’s time (to do sth.) 3 VARIANT OF 76626147雲板yun2ban3雲板 dated iron bell
                    or clapper (used by government offices or influential families to give time or
                    announce an event)
                    noun refreshments 茶點 chádiǎn tea and pastries
                    noun printing point (a unit of measurement for type bodies)

noun 1 hook 衣鉤 yīgōu clothes-hook 魚鉤 yúgōu fishhook 2 calligraphy hook stroke
                    3 check mark; tick 打鉤 dǎgōu make a check mark
                    verb 1 secure with a hook; hook 他的袖子給釘子鉤住了。 Tā de xiùzi gěi dīngzi gōu zhù le.
                    His sleeve caught on a nail. 2 crochet 鉤花邊 gōu huābiān crochet lace 3 sew with
                    large stitches 鉤貼邊 gōu tiēbiān sew on an edging 4 spoken form for the numeral 9
                    on certain occasions 5 (Gōu) a surname

verb turn sideways; slant 把桌子斜過來 bǎ zhuōzi xié guòlai turn the table sideways
                    adjective oblique; slanting; inclined; tilted 斜著眼看人 xié zhe yǎn kàn rén cast

                    nán zài. Opportunity knocks but once. 青春不再。 Qīngchūnbùzài. One’s youth never
                    returns. 我不能再喝了。 Wǒ bùnéng zài hē le. I mustn’t drink any more. 我還得再去幾次。 Wǒ hái
                    děi zài qù jǐ cì. I have to go a few more times. 我叫他別再來, 可他又來了。 Wǒ jiào tā bié
                    zài lái, kě tā yòu lái le. I told him not to come again, but here he is. 我再也不去了。
                    Wǒ zài yě bù qù le. I won’t go again. 要是再下雨, 那還得改日子。 Yào shì zài xià yǔ, nà hái
                    děi gǎi rìzi. If it rains again, the date will have to be changed. 有工夫, 請再來玩。
                    Yǒu gōngfu, qǐng zài lái wán. Please come again whenever you are free. 2 [before
                    adjectives] more; -er 再好不過了。 Zài hǎo bù guò le. It couldn’t be better. 再冷的天我也不怕。
                    Zài lěng de tiān wǒ yě bù pà. I can stand colder weather than this. 還有再大點兒的嗎？
                    Háiyǒu zài dà diǎnr de ma？ Have you got a bigger one? 聲音再大一點兒。 shēngyīn zài dà
                    yīdiǎnr. Louder, please. 3 [indicating a continuing situation in conditional or
                    suppositional clauses] 再不走我們就趕不上火車了。 Zài bù zǒu wǒmen jiù gǎn bù shàng huǒchē
                    le. We’ll miss the train if we delay any longer. 再過幾年, 這個村子就要整個變樣了。 Zài guò jǐ
                    nián, zhège cūnzi jiù yào zhěnggè biànyàng le. A few more years and this village
                    will change completely. 4 [for a delayed action, preceded by an expression of
                    time or condition] then; only then 你做完了功課再出去。 Nǐ zuò wán le gōngkè zài chūqu.
                    Finish your homework before you go out. 先到張家, 再到李家。 Xiān dào zhāng jiā, zài dào
                    lǐ jiā. First go to the Zhangs’, and then to the Lis’. 雨住了再走吧。 Yǔ zhù le zài zǒu
                    ba. Let’s leave when the rain stops. 這件事等明年再說。 Zhè jiàn shì děng míngnián
                    zàishuō. This business can keep till next year. 5 in addition; on top of that
                    到會的有教職員工, 再就是學生代表。 Dàohuì de yǒu jiàozhíyuángōng, zài jiù shì xuésheng dàibiǎo.
                    Present at the meeting were faculty, administration, and staff, and also student
                    representatives. 6 [used correlatively with 也, followed by a negative
                    expression] no matter how...still (not) 他再賣力也升不了職。 Tā zài màilì yě shēngbuliǎo
                    zhí. No matter how hard he works, he’ll never get promoted. 你再勸他也沒有用。 Nǐ zài
                    quàn tā yě méiyǒu yòng. Try as you may, you will never persuade him.

                    jiàn. See you later. 你見到他了沒有？ Nǐ jiàndào tā le méiyǒu？ Did you meet him? 我不想見他。

verb 1 explain; explicate; expound; illustrate 說明理由 shuōmíng lǐyóu give

verb explain; expound; interpret 解釋法律 jiěshì fǎlǜ interpret laws 解釋新詞 jiěshì
                    xīncí explain a new word 對這件事你怎樣解釋？ Duì zhè jiàn shì nǐ zěnyàng jiěshì? How do
                    you account for this? 這些事實不能有別的解釋。 Zhèxiē shìshí bù néng yǒu bié de jiěshì. The
                    facts admit of no other explanation. 這是誤會, 解釋一下就行了。 Zhè shì wùhuì, jiěshì yīxià
                    jiù xíng le. This is a misunderstanding. A little explanation will clear it up.
                    河水的流動可以用重力原理來解釋。 Héshuǐ de liúdòng kěyǐ yòng zhònglì yuánlǐ lái jiěshì. The flow
                    of river water is explained by the principle of gravity. 對本協定在解釋上遇有分岐, 應以中文本為準。
                    Duìběn xiédìng zài jiěshì shàng yù yǒufèn qí, yīng yǐ Zhōngwén běn wéi zhǔn. In
                    case of divergence of interpretation of this agreement, the Chinese text shall
                    prevail.

                    你要找誰嗎？ Nǐ yào zhǎo shéi ma？ Are you looking for someone? 我沒跟誰說話。 Wǒ méi gēn shéi
                    shuōhuà. I didn’t talk to anyone. 有誰能幫助我就好了。 Yǒu shéi néng bāngzhù wǒ jiù hǎo
                    le. If only someone would help me! 4 [before 都 or 也] everyone; anyone 誰也不要。 Shéi
                    yě bùyào. Nobody wants it. 誰都喜歡他。 Shéi dōu xǐhuan tā. Everybody likes him. 5
                    [repeated in two phrases] whoever 誰污染誰治理的原則 shéi wūrǎn shéi zhìlǐ de yuánzé

                    kàn shéi héshì jiù xuǎn shéi. You may elect whoever you think is suitable. 6 [as

                    shéi yě shuō bù fú shéi. Neither of them could convince the other.

                    móceng, hài de wǒmen chídào le. It is because you dawdled that we were late. 3

                    What strange weather, it’s colder at noon than early in the morning! 連他都不知道。

                    Have some candy. 再來一個！ Zàilái yī ge! [call for another performance] Encore!

                    pán qí. Let’s have a game of chess. 你歇歇, 讓我來吧。 Nǐ xiēxie, ràng wǒ lái ba. You
                    take a rest. Let me do it. 我自己來吧, 別客氣。 Wǒ zìjǐ lái ba, bié kèqi. Please don’t

                    shuōfú tā ne？ And what arguments can you use to convince him? 9 (of electricity,
